insights.title: JSON Output Standardization for Workflow Tasks
insights.problem_pattern: execute_code tasks with structured outputs fail when stdout contains mixed debug and JSON content
insights.solution_pattern: Redirect all debug output to stderr, print only pure JSON to stdout for workflow engine parsing
validation_evidence: ASASF workflow: 0% → 100% success rate after implementation
All 4 tasks completed successfully with proper data flow
JSON parsing: 'Successfully parsed stdout as JSON and merged into results'
system_validation: JSON parsing successful across all tasks

insights.title: Base64 Encoding for Context Preservation
insights.problem_pattern: Large context truncation prevents proper workflow execution and debugging
insights.solution_pattern: Use base64 encoding to preserve context integrity and prevent truncation
validation_evidence: Successful context injection across all workflow tasks

insights.title: Meta-Cognitive Shift Implementation Pattern
insights.problem_pattern: Need to transform from individual to collective intelligence across distributed systems
insights.solution_pattern: Implement distributed registry + knowledge crystallization + meta-cognitive integration
